TITLE: What happens if the Supreme Court strikes down student loan forgiveness? Here are 3 predictions
SUMMARY: Here's what experts predict will happen if the Supreme Court rules against President Joe Biden's student loan forgiveness plan.

TITLE: U.S. unemployment system still plagued by delays 3 years after pandemic-era downturn
SUMMARY: Unemployment benefits aren't reaching people in a timely manner despite a low volume of claims. The system is still recovering from the initial pandemic shock.

SUMMARY: A group of House Republicans is revisiting the Fair Tax Act, which would replace certain federal taxes with a national sales tax and decentralize the IRS.
